definition.text: The exchange data tasks node organizes data mining tasks by exchange. That is, each exchange installed in the system has an exchange data tasks node grouping all market data tasks corresponding to the said exchange.

translations.text: El nodo exchange data tasks organiza las tareas de miner√≠a de datos por mercado. Es decir, cada mercado instalado en el sistema tiene un nodo de exchange data tasks que agrupa datos del mercado correspondientes a dicho mercado.

paragraphs.text: The exchange data tasks node must reference the exchange of choice. This reference constraints the rest of the definitions to the context of the said exchange.
When representing an exchange featured in the system's icons library, the standard exchange data tasks icon is replaced by the exchange's logo.
